name: Zalikum
description: Zalikum is a huge, robust construct with a ghastly heated body. It features a beak and talons for attacks, and its body exudes a superheated sand-like material.
memorable: Its ability to return to life by storing souls and its ghastly heated body make it a uniquely terrifying foe.
goals: To eliminate enemies and store their souls for rejuvenation.
relations: May serve a powerful creator or be encountered alongside other constructs.
environment: Typically found in hostile environments, particularly deserts or locations of death and decay.
strengths: Immunity to many forms of damage, high physical resilience, and devastating melee attacks.
weaknesses: Limited intelligence and wisdom, making it ineffective in clever tasks.
attacks: Zalikum uses a beak for piercing damage and talons for slashing damage, both infused with fire and necrotic energy.
most_powerful_ability: Death-infused Desert Breath: exhale superheated sand in a cone, dealing significant fire and necrotic damage while potentially causing exhaustion.
senses: Zalikum has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in the dark effectively.
skills: Zalikum has a perception skill, allowing it to notice its surroundings somewhat effectively.
additional_information: Can inflict damage to attackers with its heated body.
Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
Does not provoke opportunity attacks when flying.
test_queries: huge construct with a heated body
monster that stores souls for resurrection
flying creature that inflicts fire damage
summoned creature from a hostile environment
agile monster with devastating breath attack
